learning_outcomes.description: Apply asymptotic results to specific econometric models.
Derive consistency results for some econometric estimators.
Highlight the different assumptions behind some advanced econometric results.
Distinguish between different classes of econometric estimators.
Formulate a framework for deriving asymptotic results.

assessments.task_description:
The assignment will consist of a set of theoretical exercises. Answers including a detailed derivation of each of the solutions to the questions need to be provided.

Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Translation (MT) provides emerging tools that may support students in completing this assessment task. Students may appropriately use AI and/or MT in completing this assessment task. Students must clearly reference any use of AI or MT in each instance.

A failure to reference generative AI or MT use may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Assignments can be submitted directly to the Lecturer.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
